title: Pirate / Castle Diary Flip-Over
description: Two highly acclaimed and popular books bound together in a fantastic flip-over format. What was it really like to live in a castle during the Middle Ages? What kind of life did a pirate lead in the 1700s? This book has all the answers! Two young boys keep journals of their day-to-day lives in a castle, and on board a pirate ship. Meticulously researched, accurate and enjoyable, this title is perfect for budding knights and pirates everywhere - and with two books in one, is excellent value! "Pirate Diary" won the Kate Greenaway Medal and the Smarties Book Prize Silver Award. "Castle Diary" was Highly Commended for the Kate Greenaway Medal, and shortlisted for the Kurt Maschler Award.
author: Richard Platt
